      • deleteMonthlyBudget

        public ServiceEmptyResponse deleteMonthlyBudget​(int budgetId,
                                                int userId)
        Description copied from interface: IService
        Deletes a monthly budget of a given user
        Specified by:
        deleteMonthlyBudget in interface IService
        Parameters:
        budgetId - id of the budget to be deleted
        userId - id of the user who requested the deletion
        Returns:
        a ServiceEmptyResponse with status=200 in case of success a ServiceEmptyResponse with status=403 in case the budget with the given id is not owned by the user with the given userId a ServiceEmptyResponse with status=500 in case the delete operation fails

      • deleteExpense

        public ExpenseViewModel deleteExpense​(int expenseId,
                                      int userId)
                               throws ServiceException
        Description copied from interface: IService
        delete an expense
        Specified by:
        deleteExpense in interface IService
        Parameters:
        expenseId - -id of the expense
        userId - -id of the user who make the request
        Returns:
        - a ServiceEmptyResponse with status: 200-succes 403-the user who make the request isn't the user with this expense 500-internal server error 404-expense not found
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if something goes wrong on the server

      • getTotalExpensesInTime

        public java.lang.Iterable<TotalExpensesDto> getTotalExpensesInTime​(int userId,
                                                                   java.lang.String granularity,
                                                                   java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                                                                   java.time.LocalDate endDate,
                                                                   java.lang.String category)
                                                            throws ServiceException
        Description copied from interface: IService
        gets an iterable with totalExpensesDto for the specified period of time, for the specified category and for the specified granularity
        Specified by:
        getTotalExpensesInTime in interface IService
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user
        granularity - granularity of the filtered results
        startDate - the start date from which we want the results
        endDate - the end date from which we want the results
        category - the category for which we want the results
        Returns:
        an iterable with the asked totalExpensesDto
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if the start date is after the end date or the granularity isn't year, month or day

        Specified by:
        findProductsByKeywordAndVendor in interface IService

        keyword - the keyword by which the product search is done
        vendor - the desired vendor
        Returns:
        a collection of WishlistItemViewModel, each representing a product
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if something is wrong with the parameters
